commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15)

project(franka_panda LANGUAGES CXX CUDA)

# set(POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE ON)
set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 17)


# set(PYBIND11_CPP_STANDARD)
# set (PYBIND11_PYTHON_VERSION "3.8")
enable_language(CUDA)

find_package(Eigen3 3.3 REQUIRED)
find_package(CUDA REQUIRED)
find_package(OpenGL REQUIRED)
find_package(GLEW REQUIRED)
find_package(pybind11 REQUIRED)
# find_package (X11)

set(SRC_FILES
    src/controller.cpp    
    src/robotmodel.cpp
    src/trajectory.cpp    
)



message("------------------------------------")
# include("${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../pybind11/tools/pybind11Common.cmake")
include_directories(
    include
    ${EIGEN3_INCLUDE_DIRS}
    ${GLEW_INCLUDE_DIRS}
    /usr/include/python3.8  # for pybind11
    # /home/kist/anaconda3/envs/rl/include/python3.8
    /usr/local/cuda-11.6
    /usr/local/cuda
    /usr/local/cuda/include
    /usr/local/cuda/lib64
)

link_directories(
    /usr/include/python3.8
    /usr/local/cuda/lib64
)
message(STATUS "PYTHON ${PYTHON_VERSION}")
message("------------------------------------")
# for pybind11
add_library(controller_cu STATIC
    src/cuda.cu
)

set_target_properties(controller_cu PROPERTIES 
    POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE ON
    # CUDA_VISIBILITY_PRESET "hidden"
    CUDA_SEPARABLE_COMPILATION ON
)

# set_property(TARGET controller_cu 
            #  PROPERTY CUDA_SEPARABLE_COMPILATION ON)

add_library(controller MODULE
    ${SRC_FILES}
    src/cuda.cu
)

set_target_properties(controller PROPERTIES 
    CXX_VISIBILITY_PRESET "hidden"
    INTERPROCEDURAL_OPTIMIZATION TRUE
    PREFIX "${PYTHON_MODULE_PREFIX}"
    SUFFIX "${PYTHON_MODULE_EXTENSION}"
)

target_link_libraries(controller PRIVATE controller_cu)

target_link_libraries(controller PRIVATE pybind11::module
    -lrbdl
    -lrbdl_urdfreader
        -lpython3.8
        Eigen3::Eigen
    )
